snippet: A high-caffeine energy drink, 5-Hour Energy, has been cited as possibly being involved in 13 deaths, according to Food and Drug Administration records.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration records show high-caffeine energy drink, 5-Hour Energy, has been cited as possibly being involved in 13 deaths over last four years; distributor Living Essentials says product is safe when used as directed.
lead_paragraph: A high-caffeine energy drink, 5-Hour Energy, has been cited as possibly being involved in 13 deaths, according to Food and Drug Administration records.

headline.seo: 5-Hour Energy Is Cited in 13 Death Reports
headline.main: Caffeinated Drink Cited in Reports of 13 Deaths
headline.print_headline: Caffeinated Drink Cited In Reports Of 13 Deaths
